text: Khwr hı phu mi thana rarwy cay tam thana khxng khea swn phu thi kar yangchiph khxng khea pen thi khabkhæn kæ khea k hı khea cay tam thi xallxhˌ thrng prathan ma hı kæ khea xallxhˌ midi thrng hı pen thi labak kæ chiwit dı wentæ tam thi phraxngkh thrng prathan ma kæ chiwit nan hlangcak khwam yak la ba kxallxhˌ ca thrng thahı keid khwam sadwk sbay
